attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's not acceptable that the only way for the electorate to ask the PM a question is through the YouTube initiative as it precludes all those who don't have the ability to make a film.

rejection.details:
The email facility will be restored.
Members of the public can write to the Prime Minister as before.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
